extendedInfo.description: Tilt your phone to catch ice cream as much as possible. Catch the same color ice cream for bonus, and colorful scoop matches any color, while star one stands for extra life. But be careful, avoid pumpkins!1.1.4Better control and more challenging.New More Games.

reviews.title: Cute game
reviews.comment: Fun and challenging, with a cute background,playful music, with an exciting goal.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: NOT BAD
reviews.comment: The game is alot of fun I must say, but it would have been better if we  could use a easier navigation in the game,and also if it was more  challenging .Then that would make it more fun!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad!
reviews.comment: Game not bad, but the creaters of this game could consider letting you get more stars than three. Other than that, it is a pretty good game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I think its boring a\'f. At first it wuz fun bt den u looze & itz too hard to tilt the phone cuz the icecream cone movz 2fast&den slow or dumm,fix itt!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: For a clone of the iOS game Scoops, it doesn\'t do a bad job of bringing that to android. More background variety and some \"collect X amount of this colour\" missions, as well as a tighter control system, and it\'s 5 stars.
reviews.author: David R-L

reviews.title: cooool g@mee
reviews.comment: its was super awesome fun but you need some excitement in the game. that is all.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ACER A200 Tablet- Hard to navigate, no instructions
reviews.comment: There are no real instructions as to how to play, short of a couple of graphics saying catching ice cream gives points, everything else takes points away.  I figured out I had to tilt the screen to move the cone, but it isn\'t terribly responsive, and I have to tip my tablet completely on it\'s side to get it to move.
reviews.author: Melissa Caldwell

reviews.title: Awesome but sensitive!!
reviews.comment: The game is really fun and cool but when u lean to catch the ice cream scoops the cone always jerks to far.
reviews.author: Emma Smith

reviews.comment: My daughter loves this games & I love the fact that it keeps her quiet for a long while. \nAwesome game!!!! Thank you!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its good but its controls are hard. Its hard ti controll it I mean. You need to harlem shake and drop your phone before you get the easy controlling.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I love this game is very much:-)  the game is fun but the screening  name is a little bit off!

reviews.title: Terribly stupid
reviews.comment: This game is so lame. I hate did game please remove it from the Web.

reviews.comment: I love how do you have to avoid the onions and tomatoes and just get the ice cream it\'s challenging kind of yup really really fun I love it!

reviews.comment: Its ok but its really hard to catch it when u have a certain amount of ice cream its so wobbly

reviews.comment: This is a really fun game but its kinda of hard i made it to the 5 moon i rated it 5

reviews.comment: Simple, fun, and average. I made it on the top 20\'s list!

reviews.comment: It is so cool.  I play it all the time on my dad\'s phone.  It is so fun to play this game.

reviews.comment: I thought we were suppose to be taking in orders for ice cream! But I was wrong

reviews.title: Kaito game
reviews.comment: It fun,it makes me think of kaito shini from vocaloid!! It his kind of game.very fun and entertaining!! Just one flaw,please make it so we can change the background& music!!!??

reviews.comment: It is very fun. It is addicting too, if I were you download it .
